let's guess: Let's guess and explore famous places all over Kazakhstan together!
almaty_desc: Guess the 30 most visited and favorite places of Almaty residents!
astana_desc: Guess the 25 most visited and favorite places of Nur-Sultan residents!
kazakhstan_desc: Guess the 30 most visited and favorite places of Kazakhstan residents!
how to text: You have to guess celebrated places and mark on the map by selecting the desired marker! However, you have only 3 chances and 20 seconds for each picture. Good luck!
would you like to try again: Would you like to try again?
would you like to try again or select ne: Would you like to try again or select next level?
would you like to go to the next level: Would you like to go to the next level?
